reference.title: DITA OT release 1.4.2.1
reference.shortdesc: Release 1.4.2.1 is a full build to provide an urgent fix to fix the following critical problem which users found in release 1.4.2.

section.title: SF Bugs Fixed

ol.li: SF Bug 1956231 OSGI Manifest for eclipsehelp transtype contains spaces.

section.p: For this fix, we have updated xsl/map2pluginImpl.xsl to prevent generating extra spaces at the head of every line in OSGI manifest file of eclipse help output.
